name: GetTrelloEnterpriseMember
description:
Retrieve a specific Trello enterprise member by ID.

Use this tool to get information about a specific member within a Trello enterprise using the member's ID. Useful for accessing member details for enterprise management.

parameters.name: enterprise_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Trello enterprise for which to retrieve member information.

value_schema.description: ID of the enterprise to retrieve.

parameters.name: member_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Trello member to retrieve details for within the enterprise.

value_schema.description: An ID of a member resource.

parameters.name: member_fields_list
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of valid member field values for retrieval.

value_schema.description: A comma separated list of any valid values that the [nested member field resource]() accepts.

parameters.name: organization_field_value
parameters.description: A valid value for the nested organization field resource, as specified by Trello guidelines.

value_schema.description: Any valid value that the [nested organization field resource](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/nested-resources/) accepts.

parameters.name: board_details_fields
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of valid fields for nested board resources to retrieve specific board information.

value_schema.description: Any valid value that the [nested board resource](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/nested-resources/) accepts.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the trello API.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A comma separated list of any valid values that the [nested member field resource]() accepts.

value_schema.description: A comma separated list of any valid values that the [nested member field resource]() accepts.

parameters.name: organization_fields
parameters.description: Any valid value that the [nested organization field resource](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/nested-resources/) accepts.

value_schema.description: Any valid value that the [nested organization field resource](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/nested-resources/) accepts.

parameters.name: board_fields
parameters.description: Any valid value that the [nested board resource](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/nested-resources/) accepts.

value_schema.description: Any valid value that the [nested board resource](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/nested-resources/) accepts.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the enterprise to retrieve.

value_schema.description: ID of the enterprise to retrieve.

parameters.name: idMember
parameters.description: An ID of a member resource.

value_schema.description: An ID of a member resource.
